name: Adventure Chef: Merge Explorer
description:
Farm, Cook, Explore and Expand! Explore forests, volcanoes, swamps, mountains, and deserts (or is it desserts?) to unlock new ingredients, food trucks, crops, and cooking tools, to turn your broken down food truck into a Food Truck Empire! Search and discover incredible new ingredients in the wilderness, and bring them back to your farm-to-table food truck, where you merge and cook ingredients to serve unique dishes to your guests!

MERGE TO COLLECT INGREDIENTS
Collect the basic ingredients in the expansive world, and bring them back to your home farm, where you can merge them together to get ever more complicated items. Turn your tomato seeds into baby seedlings, teen plants, and finally huge tomato plants that will produce all the tomatoes you could ever need.

EXPLORE THE WORLD
The world of Adventure Chef is full of mystical lands with mountains of new ingredients, people, and creatures to be discovered. Get help from misunderstood bears, stranded merchants, and a pesky seagull who will eat as much bread as you can make. In this fun, and lived in world, you will have fun discovering all of its possibilities.

FIND AND COOK NEW RECIPES
Don't worry, your small bakery truck, only capable of making loaves of bread, will soon be making everything from Apple Pies to Vegan Tacos, Mint Smoothies, and Po' Boys. Each new land unlocks new ingredients, people, and cuisines. Keep exploring to learn just how many new recipes you can find!


Please note that Adventure Chef: Merge Explorer is free to play, but you are able to purchase game items with real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases.
